1292310.name: Solar Sails: Space Pirates
1292310.description:
Solar Sails is a space-action RPG with adventure elements. Control a pirate ship, plunder the royal navy, launch a scout duck to search for treasures, upgrade your ship with alien technologies, and sail onwards to unveil the darkest secrets of the universe.

Play like a pirate

You control a team of space pirates in a galaxy full of dangers, ancient mysteries, and unique alien species. To make a living, you complete quests to build a reputation with various factions, smuggle illegal goods, raid trade convoys, and search for alien artifacts to sell on the black market. But be wary, your actions as a pirate will trigger a response from the authorities.

Control a pirate crew

The ship you control has operation modules - steering, weaponry, drone, mast, and deck - which must be manned by crew members. Each crew member has their own skill tree, with specialized abilities for each module. You can train and assign your crew members to specific modules, which impacts your arsenal of active and passive abilities. This allows you to experiment with different crew layouts and combat styles.

Story

The story revolves around four main characters - a gruesome self-loathing captain who seeks to bring his family back from the dead; an underappreciated young engineer who searches for his long-gone cat that doubtfully exists; a young cadet accused of mass murder due to her unruly magical powers, and therefore, determined to learn to control them; and a time-traveling duck determined to prevent the end of the galaxy in the future.

Driven by tales of riches and promises of immense power, the pirates open Pandora's Box - a gateway to another dimension - and unleash an ancient evil that threatens to consume all life in the galaxy. Will the pirates be able to put their personal goals aside and work toward the common good? Or will they doom the galaxy in pursuit of personal ambitions?


Features

  • Explore a unique fantasy universe with its species, factions, and characters.

  • Plunder merchants, outposts, and convoys to loot valuable goods and artifacts.

  • Capture hostages to trade them for ransom or interrogate them for additional information.

  • Smuggle illegal goods and commodities to make some extra gold.

  • Control a space duck to scout asteroids and find hidden treasures.

  • Upgrade your ship with powerful alien technologies and abilities.

  • Level up your characters - each has their own skillset to contribute to the ship's arsenal.

  • Collect treasure maps, ancient texts, and artifacts, and unlock secret levels.

  • Earn Reputation with different factions by completing their quests.

  • Help Pastafarians spread the gospel of the Flying Spaghetti Monster in the galaxy.

  • Gain Power-Ups from enemies, alien runes, and giant space bowls with pasta.

Ready or not, hoist the damn sails!
